text:
interesting. There’s a resolver error too,
```ERROR: Unsatisfiable requirements detected for package Mads [d6bdc55b]:
 Mads [d6bdc55b] log:
 ├─possible versions are: 0.5.2-1.0.8 or uninstalled
 ├─restricted by compatibility requirements with NMFk [e40cd9e2] to versions: 1.0.0-1.0.8
 │ └─NMFk [e40cd9e2] log:
 │   ├─possible versions are: 0.1.0-1.1.19 or uninstalled
 │   └─restricted to versions 1.1.19 by an explicit requirement, leaving only versions 1.1.19
 └─restricted by compatibility requirements with RobustPmap [27aeedcb] to versions: 0.5.2-0.10.8 or uninstalled — no versions left
   └─RobustPmap [27aeedcb] log:
     ├─possible versions are: 0.3.0-1.0.0 or uninstalled
     └─restricted by compatibility requirements with BIGUQ [7f9c7709] to versions: 0.3.0-0.6.0
       └─BIGUQ [7f9c7709] log:
         ├─possible versions are: 0.6.0-0.8.0 or uninstalled
         └─restricted to versions * by an explicit requirement, leaving only versions 0.6.0-0.8.0```
I wonder if that’s related?
